sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react';
import { Link } from "react-router-dom";
import { Dropdown, Icon, Menu, MenuItem } from 'semantic-ui-react';
import Faturamento from "../body/mainFunction/mainFunction";

const styleLink = document.createElement("link");
styleLink.rel = "stylesheet";
styleLink.href = "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/semantic-ui/dist/semantic.min.css";
document.head.appendChild(styleLink);

export default class MenuExampleSubMenu extends Component {
  state = {}


  handleItemClick = async (e, name ) => {

    this.setState({ activeItem: name })
    
  }


  render() {
    const { activeItem } = this.state

    return (
      <Menu inverted
        vertical
        fixed="left"
        size="huge"
        color="orange">
        <Menu.Item>
          Portal de Faturamento - Adm
        </Menu.Item>

        {/* Menu Faturamento */}
        <Dropdown item text='Faturamento'>
          <Dropdown.Menu >
          {/* <Link to='/app/faturamento'> */}
            <Menu.Item
              icon='edit'
              name='faturamento'
              active={activeItem === 'faturamento'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
            </Menu.Item>
            {/* </Link> */}
            <Menu.Item 
                icon='file alternate' 
                name='Visualizar Faturamento'
                active={activeItem === 'Visualizar Faturamento'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
            <Menu.Item 
                icon='file alternate outline' 
                name='Faturamentos Realizados'
                active={activeItem === 'Faturamentos Realizados'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
            <Menu.Item 
                icon='percent' 
                name='Consumo Total'
                active={activeItem === 'Consumo Total'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
          </Dropdown.Menu>
        </Dropdown>

        {/* Menu Backup Faturamento */}
        <Dropdown item text='Backup Faturamento'>
          <Dropdown.Menu>
            <Menu.Item 
                icon='save' 
                name='Realizar Backup'
                active={activeItem === 'Realizar Backup'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
            <Menu.Item 
                icon='save outline' 
                name='Backups à Realizar'
                active={activeItem === 'Backups à Realizar'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
          </Dropdown.Menu>
        </Dropdown>

         {/* Menu Manter Ramais */}
         <Dropdown item text='Manter Ramais'>
          <Dropdown.Menu>
            <Menu.Item
                icon='phone square'
                name='Registrar Ramais' 
                active={activeItem === 'Registrar Ramais'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
            <Menu.Item 
                icon='phone' 
                name='Ativar Ramais' 
                active={activeItem === 'Ativar Ramais'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
             <Menu.Item 
                icon='phone' 
                name='Ramais Mês' 
                active={activeItem === 'Ramais Mês'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
             <Menu.Item 
                icon='phone' 
                name='Mudar Ramal de Grupo'
                active={activeItem === 'Mudar Ramal de Grupo'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
             <Menu.Item 
                icon='phone' 
                name='Desativar Ramais' 
                active={activeItem === 'Desativar Ramais'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
          </Dropdown.Menu>
          </Dropdown>

        {/* Menu Consultar Ramais */}
        <Dropdown item text='Consultar Ramais'>
          <Dropdown.Menu>
            <Menu.Item 
                icon='phone square' 
                name='Listar Ramais' 
                active={activeItem === 'Listar Ramais'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
            <Menu.Item 
                icon='phone' 
                name='Ramal'
                active={activeItem === 'Ramal'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
             <Menu.Item 
                icon='phone' 
                name='Ramais M\ês'
                active={activeItem === 'Ramais Mês'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
             <Menu.Item 
                icon='phone' 
                name='Ramais Quantidade' 
                active={activeItem === 'Ramais Quantidade'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
          </Dropdown.Menu>
        </Dropdown>
       
        {/* Menu Tipo de Ligações */}
        <Dropdown item text='Manter Tipo de Ligações'>
          <Dropdown.Menu>
            <Menu.Item 
                  icon='teletype' 
                  name='Manter'
                  active={activeItem === 'Manter'}
                  onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
            <Menu.Item 
                icon='teletype' 
                name='Listar'
                active={activeItem === 'Listar'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
            <Menu.Item 
                icon='delete' 
                name='Remover'
                active={activeItem === 'Remover'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
          </Dropdown.Menu>
        </Dropdown>

        {/* Menu Tarifas */}
        <Dropdown item text='Manter Tarifas'>
          <Dropdown.Menu>
            <Menu.Item 
                  icon='teletype' 
                  name='Registrar Tarifas'
                  active={activeItem === 'Registrar Tarifas'}
                  onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
            <Menu.Item 
                icon='teletype' 
                name='Listar Tarifas'
                active={activeItem === 'Listar Tarifas'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
          <Menu.Item 
                icon='teletype' 
                name='Atualizar Tarifas'
                active={activeItem === 'Atualizar Tarifas'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
          <Menu.Item 
                icon='delete' 
                name='Remover Tarifas'
                active={activeItem === 'Remover Tarifas'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
          </Dropdown.Menu>
        </Dropdown>


        <Menu.Item
              name='logout'
              active={activeItem === 'logout'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}
            >
        <Icon name='sign out'/>
          Logout
        </Menu.Item>
      </Menu>
    )
  }
}
